tasks.label: Start Android Device
tasks.command: $env:ANDROID_HOME = 'C:\Users\alexi\AppData\Local\Android\Sdk'; if (Test-Path "$env:ANDROID_HOME\platform-tools\adb.exe") { Write-Host 'Available Devices:' -ForegroundColor Green; & "$env:ANDROID_HOME\platform-tools\adb.exe" devices; Write-Host '`nAvailable Emulators:' -ForegroundColor Green; & "$env:ANDROID_HOME\emulator\emulator.exe" -list-avds; $choice = Read-Host 'Choose device type (1 for USB device, 2 for emulator)'; if ($choice -eq '1') { Write-Host 'Using USB device...' -ForegroundColor Yellow } elseif ($choice -eq '2') { $avd = Read-Host 'Enter the name of the AVD you want to launch'; if ($avd) { & "$env:ANDROID_HOME\emulator\emulator.exe" -avd $avd -no-snapshot-load } else { Write-Error 'No AVD selected.' } } else { Write-Error 'Invalid choice.' } } else { Write-Error 'Android platform tools not found. Please ensure Android SDK is properly installed.' }

tasks.label: Restart Android App
tasks.command: npx cap sync android; npx cap run android
